Package src.controller

Class RoomManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.controller.RoomManager
  • public class RoomManager
extends java.lang.Object
    RoomManager is a controller class that acts as a "middleman" between the view classes - HotelAppView and RoomView and the model class - Room.

    It can initialize or update the room and print Room Status statistic report.

    Since:
    2022-04-04

        Parameters:
        floorNumber - floor number of the room
        roomNumber - room number of the room
        roomStatus - room status of the room
        guestIds - Ids of the guest(s) to be added/removed from the room
        Returns:
        true if successful. Otherwise, false if the room id not found.

        public static Room createRoom​(RoomType roomType,
                              java.lang.String roomId,
                              int floorNumber,
                              int roomNumber,
                              RoomStatus roomStatus,
                              boolean isWifiEnabled,
                              boolean isSmokingAllowed)
        Method to create rooms

        See RoomType For the different room type

        See RoomStatus For the different status of the room

        Parameters:
        roomType - Type of the room
        roomId - the room Id for the room
        floorNumber - Floor number of the room
        roomNumber - Room number of the room
        roomStatus - Status of the room
        isWifiEnabled - whether the wifi is enabled in the room
        isSmokingAllowed - whether the smoking is allowed in the room
        Returns:
        Room object that is being created

      • validateNumOfPax

        public static boolean validateNumOfPax​(java.lang.String roomId,
                                       int numOfPax)
        Validate if the number of pax exceeds the maximum capacity of the room or not.
        Parameters:
        roomId - room id of the room you want to check
        numOfPax - the number of pax of the room
        Returns:
        true if the number of pax does not exceed the room capacity. Otherwise, false if number of pax is not valid.
